models.stats: Summary counts displayed as stat cards at the top of the dashboard.
models.agentActivity: A group of recent activity events attributed to a specific agent.
models.activityEvent: A single event in an agent's activity feed — a task completion, memory save, message sent, etc.

relationships: Each agentActivity group contains many activityEvents
Stats are aggregated from Tasks and Agents across the system

events.description: Checked in for SFO → JFK flight on Thursday

Learned preference: prefers window seats on flights
Organized inbox — archived 23 newsletters, flagged 3 important emails
Researching restaurant options for Friday dinner in Manhattan
Pulled latest GitHub notifications and created summary
Cannot access Google Calendar — token expired, re-authentication needed
Updated project board with sprint progress from Linear
